```{r}
library(chromote)
# create chromote session for screenshots
source(here::here("config/viz_config.R"))
source(here::here("docs/color_blindness_check/utils.R"))
cbc_dir <- here::here("docs/color_blindness_check/")
```

```{r}
# check whether document is rendered on its own, then set pal_name to a value for testing
if (!"pal_name" %in% ls()) {
    pal_name <- "pal_yes_no"
}
```

## `r pal_name`
```{r}
#| include: false
pal <- rlang::env_get(rlang::global_env(), pal_name)
pal_url <- get_colorblindness_check_url(pal)
if (do_take_screenshots) {
    take_screenshots(cbc_dir, pal_url, pal_name)
}
```

Visit URL for full information from "Coloring for Colorblindness": [Color blindness check for `r pal_name`](`r pal_url`)

#### Screenshots `r pal_name`
```{r}
#| results: asis

```
